text: Be gumon, kasone, ki kufr varzidand va [monandi moçaroi Hudajʙija mardumro] az rohi Alloh taolo ʙozmedorand [azoʙe dardnok dar peş dorand] va Masçidu-l-harom, ki onro ʙaroi mardum [qiʙla va iʙodatgoh] qaror dodem, muqimu musofir dar on jaksonand va har ki dar on ço ʙo sitamgorī [va gunoh] inhirof ʙixohad, az azoʙe dardnok ʙa ū mecaşonem
